title: Why open source is the cradle of artificial intelligence

title: Cisco to buy Splunk in $28B bid to secure enterprises in AI era
description: Estimated to be worth $28 billion, Cisco's planned acquisition of Splunk will form one of the world's largest software vendors that will look to help enterprises better safeguard themselves as AI becomes pervasive.

title: This $200 stick vacuum is just as good as a Dyson - and it has a mop
